I can't believe what my husband did today.
I'm here for you. What happened?
He forgot our anniversary! And he didn't even apologize when I reminded him!
That sounds really hurtful. How did you react?
I was so mad! I gave him the silent treatment and went to bed without saying a word.
I can understand why you would feel that way. Do you think he has a good reason for forgetting?
I really hope so, but I doubt it. I think he just doesn't care about our relationship anymore.
Relationships can go through rough patches. Maybe it's just a temporary lapse. Have you talked about it?
No, I'm still too upset to have a calm conversation. But I know we need to talk about it soon.
Communication is key. It's important to express your feelings and concerns. Maybe you'll be surprised by his response.
You're right, maybe I should give him a chance to explain himself. Thank you for listening to me.
I'm glad I could help. Remember, relationships require effort from both sides. I hope things work out for you.
